text: the inquest also heard from retired leicestershire police chief superintendent , michael perry , who survived the attack in tunisia .

`` then i realised this was the terrorist . ''

documents.title: council 'bringing hypnotism policy up to date '
text: unfortunately , i suspect it is unlikely that kenny craig will be bringing a show to charnwood , but other hypnotists may be able to perform .

alan twells , from the borough council , said : `` we were contacted by a performer in november last year , who asked us what they would need to do in order to hold a hypnotism performance in one of our venues .

`` there 's currently national guidance for the hypnotism act from 1952 , but as it 's from a number of years ago , we 've decided to take this opportunity to introduce an up-to-date policy for charnwood . ''
